topic.title: Zeronet on an older mac (10.6)
topic.body: I'm trying to run zeronet on an older mac. When I run it (python zeronet.py) I get the error: "ImportError: No module named gevent.". What can I do about this?

3_168qV1Xxp2EyszrzdECLUwXrn9wGYjDdar.body: Just exported my wordpress blog (dutch) to HTML. Sadly the css doesn't work so it is quite ugly: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1M7Ub4nz6SbJrXkSmi9w7Fp17mC47PLyr2

> [be](#comment_1_1F8yQBY5zChi4pY7B2ZyzZKdtppmoiuvF): Just exported my wordpress blog (dutch) to HTML. Sadly the css doesn't work so it is quite ugly: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1M7Ub4nz6SbJrXkSmi9w7Fp17mC47PLyr2

Made another export and it is somewhat nicer :)

1_1F8yQBY5zChi4pY7B2ZyzZKdtppmoiuvF.body:
Thanks for your reply! I installed gevent + msgpack like the instructions on Github. On my newer mac, everything runs fine (otherwise, I could type here..). 

I Ran "PYTHONPATH=/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages python zeronet.py". Now I get another error :S

"ImportError: dlopen(/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/greenlet.so, 2): Symbol not found: _PyCapsule_New"

Any Ideas?
